public_base_url.description: Fully-qualified callback URL that Webex should call (the component uses it exactly as provided).

secret_token.description: Optional secret used to validate Webex signatures (`X-Webex-Signature`).

dry_run.description: When true, the component only reports the planned webhook without touching the Webex API.

api_base_url.description: Optional override for the Webex API base URL (defaults to https://webexapis.com/v1).
